AUGMENT Augment will let you see the object chosen by you augmented into the real world. 360° Object Rotation This feature lets you rotate the object in and around, to get a clear picture what you are exactly buying. This feature lets you capture the surrounds after the objects are augmented. Also lets you share between the close ones. CAPTURE SHARE NEXT SKIP START
Catalog Augment
Catalog is the ECommerce Service Provider, which includes functionalities like Favourites, Share, 360 deg View of the article and the Augment using Pattern.
Augment is a camera application that lets the user watch the article augmented onto the real world with the help of a pattern, these patterns can be downloaded from \n http://portal.immersionslabs.com/
